articles.title: Attack On Titan exhibition coming to Singapore's ArtScience Museum in February - CNA
articles.description: Running from Feb 19 to Jul 3, this is the exhibition's Southeast Asian premiere and coincides with the screening of The Final Season Part 2 anime now on Netflix.
articles.content:
If youre a huge fan of the hit manga and anime, Attack On Titan, get yourself to the ArtScience Museum from Feb 19 to experience the series in a whole new way.

articles.title: Brent oil hits highest level in more than 7 years - CNA
articles.description:
HONG KONG: Brent crude prices hit their highest level in more than seven years on Tuesday (Jan 18) on growing demand optimism, easing concerns about the Omicron COVID-19 variant and geopolitical tensions.

The contract hit US$86.84 in Asian trade, a level n…
